vista.set
Class NameSort

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.NameSort
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sorter
public class NameSort
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sorter

Sorts an array of named by their names The default sorting order is increasing.

Version:
$Id: NameSort.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:27 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
